blogPost.excerpt: Keeping up-to-date with the research literature is not easy. Nowadays, papers in your field are being published faster than you'll ever be able to read them. AllPapers will organize your daily personal feed with your favourite journals.
blogPost.body: Keeping up-to-date with the research literature is not easy. Nowadays, papers in your field are being published faster than you'll ever be able to read them. AllPapers will organize your daily personal feed with your favourite journals.
blogPost.title: Allpapers - A daily personalized feed of research papers
blogPost.author: Ruslan Konovalov

localize.description: 研究文献の最新情報を得ることは容易ではありません。今日、あなたの分野の論文は、あなたが読むことができないほどの速さで出版されています。AllPapersは、あなたのお気に入りのジャーナルで毎日のパーソナルフィードを整理します。
localize.tagline: 研究論文を毎日個別に配信

localize.description: 保持最新的研究文献并不容易。如今，你所在领域的论文发表速度比你能读到的还要快。AllPapers将用你最喜欢的期刊组织你的日常个人资讯。
localize.tagline: 每天提供个性化的研究论文

localize.description: 保持最新的研究文獻並不容易。如今，你所在領域的論文發表速度比你能讀到的還要快。AllPapers將用你最喜歡的期刊組織你的日常個人資訊。
localize.tagline: 每天提供個性化的研究論文

previous.excerpt: Connect your iPad to your monitor and turn your monitor into a second screen for your iPad!
previous.title: shiftscreen 4X - Turn your iPad into a desktop computer

localize.description: iPadをモニターに接続すると、モニターがiPadのセカンドスクリーンに早変わりします。
localize.tagline: iPadをデスクトップPCにする

localize.description: 将你的iPad连接到你的显示器上，将你的显示器变成你的iPad的第二个屏幕!
localize.tagline: 把你的iPad变成一台桌面电脑

localize.description: 將你的iPad連接到你的顯示器上，將你的顯示器變成你的iPad的第二個屏幕!
localize.tagline: 把你的iPad變成一臺桌面電腦
